channel.title: music on Escaping Perfection
channel.description: Recent content in music on Escaping Perfection

item.title: Productivity
item.description: Today is the start of my official employee vacation, though, I work from home so the difference isn’t that noticible. I’ve never fished before, but I started coding a fishing game to pass the time. I have less than 100 hours in Stardew Valley, but 80% of my hours spent in that game were spent in the fishing minigame. Something about simple repeatable activities with gradual rewards is especially satisfying to me.

item.title: Whoops
item.description: Work has caused this site to get away from me. But I think I have learned something in the weeks that I haven’t written here. I have undervalued the storytelling ability of lyrics and song. Since I was young, I’ve had ideas of stories I wish to wrote, some about other times, some about other planets. But what I only recently realized is that the story wasn’t as important to me as the message I wanted to convey, and the way I wished to convey it.
